name: Black Bean Quesadillas from GOYA®
author: Goya
summary: For a healthy and tasty take on the cheesy Mexican snack, fill your quesadillas with nutritious GOYA® Low Sodium Black Beans! GOYA® Beans are high in fiber, very low in fat and boast more fiber than most whole grain foods. Simply mix the beans with GOYA® Pico de Gallo, freshly chopped herbs and a handful of cheese, fill the quesadilla, and cook. The results: the same gooey taste we crave, plus more!
ingredients: 1 cup GOYA® Pico de Gallo Salsa
1 (15.5 ounce) can GOYA® Low Sodium Black Beans, drained and rinsed
½ cup shredded Monterey Jack cheese
1 teaspoon GOYA® Extra Virgin Olive Oil
directions: Using small-hole strainer, drain liquid from Pico de Gallo Salsa; discard liquid
Transfer remaining tomato mixture to medium bowl
Mix in black beans, cheese and cilantro until combined
Divide black bean mixture evenly over half of each tortilla (about 1/2 cup each)
Heat large griddle or skillet over medium-high heat
Cook, carefully flipping once, until tortillas are golden brown and crisp and cheese filling melts, about 5 minutes
Serve with your favorite GOYA® Salsita variety, if desired
